00030 
00055 class CubicSpline
00056 {    
00057 public:
00058     // default constructor
00059     CubicSpline() :
00060         _boundaries(splineNormal) {}
00061     
00062     // destructor
00063     ~CubicSpline() {};    
00064     
00066     enum eBoundary {
00067         splineNormal = 0,  
00068         splinePeriodic,    
00069         splineDerivativeZero 
00070     };
00071     
00073     void setBC(eBoundary bc) {_boundaries = bc; }
00074     
00077     int GenerateGrid(double min, double max, double h);
00078     
00081     int getInterval(const double &r);
00082     
00084     double getGridPoint(const int &i) {return _r[i];}
00085 
00086     // give string in rangeparser format: e.g. 1:0.1:10;11:1:20
00087     //int GenerateGrid(string range);
00088 
00093     void Interpolate(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::vector<double> &y);
00094     
00098     void Fit(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::vector<double> &y);
00099     
00100     
00102     double Calculate(const double &x);
00103 
00105     double CalculateDerivative(const double &x);
00106     
00107     
00109     template<typename vector_type1, typename vector_type2>
00110     void Calculate(vector_type1 &x, vector_type2 &y);
00111     template<typename vector_type1, typename vector_type2>
00112     void CalculateDerivative(vector_type1 &x, vector_type2 &y);
00113        
00115     template<typename vector_type>
00116     void setSplineData(vector_type &f, vector_type &f2) { _f = f; _f2 = f2;}
00117     
00119     void Print(std::ostream &out, double interval = 0.0001 );
00120         
00122     ub::vector<double> &getX() {return _r; }
00124     ub::vector<double> &getSplineF() { return _f; }
00126     ub::vector<double> &getSplineF2() { return _f2; }
00127     
00128     // stuff to construct fitting matrices
00129     
00134     template<typename matrix_type>
00135     void AddToFitMatrix(matrix_type &A, double x,
00136             int offset1, int offset2=0, double scale=1);
00137     
00138     template<typename matrix_type, typename vector_type>
00139     void AddToFitMatrix(matrix_type &M, vector_type &x, 
00140             int offset1, int offset2=0);
00141     
00142     // add the boundary conditions
00143     template<typename matrix_type>
00144     void AddBCToFitMatrix(matrix_type &A,
00145             int offset1, int offset2=0);
00146 
00147 
00148 protected:    
00149     // the grid points
00150     ub::vector<double> _r;
00151     
00152     // y values of grid points
00153     ub::vector<double> _f;
00154     // second derivatives of grid points
00155     ub::vector<double> _f2;
00156 
00157     eBoundary _boundaries;
00158     
00159     // A spline can be written in the form
00160     // S_i(x) =   A(x,x_i,x_i+1)*f_i     + B(x,x_i,x_i+1)*f''_i 
00161     //          + C(x,x_i,x_i+1)*f_{i+1} + D(x,x_i,x_i+1)*f''_{i+1}
00162     double A(const double &r);
00163     double B(const double &r);
00164     double C(const double &r);
00165     double D(const double &r);
00166 
00167     double Aprime(const double &r);
00168     double Bprime(const double &r);
00169     double Cprime(const double &r);
00170     double Dprime(const double &r);
00171   
00172     // tabulated derivatives at grid points. Second argument: 0 - left, 1 - right    
00173     double A_prime_l(int i);     
00174     double A_prime_r(int i);     
00175     double B_prime_l(int i);    
00176     double B_prime_r(int i);    
00177     double C_prime_l(int i);
00178     double C_prime_r(int i);
00179     double D_prime_l(int i);
00180     double D_prime_r(int i);
00181 };
00182 
00183 inline int CubicSpline::GenerateGrid(double min, double max, double h)
00184 {
00185     int vec_size = 1 + (int)((max-min)/h);  //check it!
00186     _r.resize(vec_size);
00187     int i;
00188    
00189     double r_init;
00190    
00191     for (r_init = min, i=0; i < vec_size - 1; r_init += h ) {
00192             _r[i++]= r_init;
00193     }
00194     _r[i] = max;
00195     _f.resize(_r.size(), false);
00196     _f2.resize(_r.size(), false);
00197     return _r.size();
00198 }
00199 
00200 inline double CubicSpline::Calculate(const double &r)
00201 {
00202     int interval =  getInterval(r);
00203     return  A(r)*_f[interval] 
00204             + B(r)*_f[interval + 1] 
00205             + C(r)*_f2[interval]
00206             + D(r)*_f2[interval + 1];
00207 }
00208 
00209 inline double CubicSpline::CalculateDerivative(const double &r)
00210 {
00211     int interval =  getInterval(r);
00212     return  Aprime(r)*_f[interval]
00213             + Bprime(r)*_f[interval + 1]
00214             + Cprime(r)*_f2[interval]
00215             + Dprime(r)*_f2[interval + 1];
00216 }
00217 
00218 template<typename vector_type1, typename vector_type2>
00219 inline void CubicSpline::Calculate(vector_type1 &x, vector_type2 &y)
00220 {
00221     for(size_t i=0; i<x.size(); ++i) 
00222         y(i) = Calculate(x(i));
00223 }
00224 template<typename vector_type1, typename vector_type2>
00225 inline void CubicSpline::CalculateDerivative(vector_type1 &x, vector_type2 &y)
00226 {
00227     for(size_t i=0; i<x.size(); ++i)
00228         y(i) = CalculateDerivative(x(i));
00229 }
00230 inline void CubicSpline::Print(std::ostream &out, double interval)
00231 {
00232     for (double x = _r[0]; x < _r[_r.size() - 1]; x += interval)
00233         out << x << " " << Calculate(x) << "\n";    
00234 }
00235 
00236 template<typename matrix_type>
00237 inline void CubicSpline::AddToFitMatrix(matrix_type &M, double x, 
00238             int offset1, int offset2, double scale)
00239 {
00240     int spi = getInterval(x);
00241     M(offset1, offset2 + spi) += A(x)*scale;
00242     M(offset1, offset2 + spi+1) += B(x)*scale;
00243     M(offset1, offset2 + spi + _r.size()) += C(x)*scale;
00244     M(offset1, offset2 + spi + _r.size() + 1) += D(x)*scale;
00245 }
00246 
00247 template<typename matrix_type, typename vector_type>
00248 inline void CubicSpline::AddToFitMatrix(matrix_type &M, vector_type &x, 
00249             int offset1, int offset2)
00250 {
00251     for(size_t i=0; i<x.size(); ++i) {
00252         int spi = getInterval(x(i));
00253         M(offset1+i, offset2 + spi) = A(x(i));
00254         M(offset1+i, offset2 + spi+1) = B(x(i));
00255         M(offset1+i, offset2 + spi + _r.size()) = C(x(i));
00256         M(offset1+i, offset2 + spi + _r.size() + 1) = D(x(i));
00257     }
00258 }
00259 
00260 template<typename matrix_type>
00261 inline void CubicSpline::AddBCToFitMatrix(matrix_type &M,
00262             int offset1, int offset2)
00263 {
00264     for(size_t i=0; i<_r.size() - 2; ++i) {
00265             M(offset1+i+1, offset2 + i) = A_prime_l(i);
00266             M(offset1+i+1, offset2 + i+1) = B_prime_l(i) - A_prime_r(i);
00267             M(offset1+i+1, offset2 + i+2) = -B_prime_r(i);
00268 
00269             M(offset1+i+1, offset2 + _r.size() + i) = C_prime_l(i);
00270             M(offset1+i+1, offset2 + _r.size() + i+1) = D_prime_l(i) - C_prime_r(i);
00271             M(offset1+i+1, offset2 + _r.size() + i+2) = -D_prime_r(i);
00272     }
00273     // currently only natural boundary conditions:
00274     switch(_boundaries) {
00275         case splineNormal:
00276             M(offset1, offset2 + _r.size()) = 1;
00277             M(offset1 + _r.size() - 1, offset2 + 2*_r.size()-1) = 1;
00278             break;
00279         case splineDerivativeZero:
00280             // y
00281             M(offset1+0, offset2 + 0) = -1*A_prime_l(0);
00282             M(offset1+0, offset2 + 1) = -1*B_prime_l(0);
00283 
00284             M(offset1+ _r.size()-1, offset2 + _r.size()-2) = A_prime_l(_r.size()-2);
00285             M(offset1+ _r.size()-1, offset2 + _r.size()-1) = B_prime_l(_r.size()-2);
00286             
00287             // y''
00288             M(offset1+0, offset2 + _r.size() + 0) =  D_prime_l(0);
00289             M(offset1+0, offset2 + _r.size() + 1) = C_prime_l(0);
00290 
00291             M(offset1+ _r.size()-1, offset2 + 2*_r.size()-2) = C_prime_l(_r.size()-2);
00292             M(offset1+ _r.size()-1, offset2 + 2*_r.size()-1) = D_prime_l(_r.size()-2);
00293             break;
00294 
00295         case splinePeriodic:
00296             M(offset1, offset2) = 1;
00297             M(offset1, offset2 + _r.size()-1) = -1;
00298             M(offset1 + _r.size() - 1, offset2 + _r.size()) = 1;
00299             M(offset1 + _r.size() - 1, offset2 + 2*_r.size()-1) = -1;
00300             break;
00301     }
00302     
00303 }
00304 
00305 
00306 inline double CubicSpline::A(const double &r)
00307 {
00308     return ( 1.0 - (r -_r[getInterval(r)])/(_r[getInterval(r)+1]-_r[getInterval(r)]) );
00309 }
00310 
00311 inline double CubicSpline::Aprime(const double &r)
00312 {
00313     return  -1.0/(_r[getInterval(r)+1]-_r[getInterval(r)]);
00314 }
00315 
00316 inline double CubicSpline::B(const double &r)
00317 {
00318     return  (r -_r[getInterval(r)])/(_r[getInterval(r)+1]-_r[getInterval(r)]) ;
00319 }
00320 
00321 inline double CubicSpline::Bprime(const double &r)
00322 {
00323     return  1.0/(_r[getInterval(r)+1]-_r[getInterval(r)]);
00324 }
00325 
00326 inline double CubicSpline::C(const double &r)
00327 {
00328     double xxi, h;
00329     xxi = r -_r[getInterval(r)];
00330     h   = _r[getInterval(r)+1]-_r[getInterval(r)];
00331     
00332     return ( 0.5*xxi*xxi - (1.0/6.0)*xxi*xxi*xxi/h - (1.0/3.0)*xxi*h) ;
00333 }
00334 inline double CubicSpline::Cprime(const double &r)
00335 {
00336     double xxi, h;
00337     xxi = r -_r[getInterval(r)];
00338     h   = _r[getInterval(r)+1]-_r[getInterval(r)];
00339 
00340     return (xxi - 0.5*xxi*xxi/h - h/3);
00341 }
00342 inline double CubicSpline::D(const double &r)
00343 {
00344     double xxi, h;
00345     xxi = r -_r[getInterval(r)];
00346     h   = _r[getInterval(r)+1]-_r[getInterval(r)]; 
00347     
00348     return ( (1.0/6.0)*xxi*xxi*xxi/h - (1.0/6.0)*xxi*h ) ;
00349 }
00350 inline double CubicSpline::Dprime(const double &r)
00351 {
00352     double xxi, h;
00353     xxi = r -_r[getInterval(r)];
00354     h   = _r[getInterval(r)+1]-_r[getInterval(r)];
00355 
00356     return ( 0.5*xxi*xxi/h - (1.0/6.0)*h ) ;
00357 }
00358 //inline int CubicSpline::getInterval(double &r)
00359 //{
00360 //    if (r < _r[0] || r > _r[_r.size() - 1]) return -1;
00361 //    return int( (r - _r[0]) / (_r[_r.size()-1] - _r[0]) * (_r.size() - 1) );
00362 //}
00363 
00364 inline int CubicSpline::getInterval(const double &r)
00365 {
00366     if (r < _r[0]) return 0;
00367     if(r > _r[_r.size() - 2]) return _r.size()-2;
00368     size_t i;
00369     for(i=0; i<_r.size(); ++i)
00370         if(_r[i]>r) break;
00371     return i-1;
00372 } 
00373 
00374 inline double CubicSpline::A_prime_l(int i)
00375 {
00376     return -1.0/(_r[i+1]-_r[i]);
00377 }
00378 
00379 inline double CubicSpline::B_prime_l(int i)
00380 {
00381     return 1.0/(_r[i+1]-_r[i]);
00382 }
00383 
00384 inline double CubicSpline::C_prime_l(int i)
00385 {
00386     return (1.0/6.0)*(_r[i+1]-_r[i]);
00387 }
00388 
00389 inline double CubicSpline::D_prime_l(int i)
00390 {
00391     return (1.0/3.0)*(_r[i+1]-_r[i]);
00392 }
00393 
00394 inline double CubicSpline::A_prime_r(int i)
00395 {
00396     return -1.0/(_r[i+2]-_r[i+1]);
00397 }
00398 
00399 inline double CubicSpline::B_prime_r(int i)
00400 {
00401     return 1.0/(_r[i+2]-_r[i+1]);
00402 }
00403 
00404 inline double CubicSpline::C_prime_r(int i)
00405 {
00406     return -(1.0/3.0)*(_r[i+2]-_r[i+1]);
00407 }
00408 
00409 inline double CubicSpline::D_prime_r(int i)
00410 {
00411     return -(1.0/6.0)*(_r[i+2]-_r[i+1]);
00412 }
00413 
00414 }}
